entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain showers or flurries beginning after midnight then changing to flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
